body:
I think this works only when building TensorFlow for one architecture? (`compile_ios_tensorflow.sh -a arm64`)
However it doesn't work when building for multiple architectures (`compile_ios_tensorflow.sh`)
In the latter case, the current script will archive the library at `downloads/nsync/builds/lipo.ios.c++11/nsync.a`

Could you test the multiple architectures flow?
body_html:
I think this works only when building TensorFlow for one architecture? (compile_ios_tensorflow.sh -a arm64)
